title: OSI Scout: Core Scanner
prompt: Implement Python wrapper around Dockerized Kali Linux to run Nmap and Nikto scans automatically.

title: OSI Scout: AI Analysis
prompt: Integrate Local Ollama (Llama 3) to analyze Nmap/Nikto scan results and generate 'Hacker Perspective' insights.

title: OSI Scout: 5G Audit Module
prompt: Implement 'Phase 2: GTP-U Vulnerabilty Assessment' module in `osi_scanner.py` using Scapy to check for exposed TEID/GTP ports (UDP 2152, 2123).

title: OSI Vision: Camera AI Prototype
prompt: Create `osi_vision.py` using YOLOv8 (Ultralytics) to process a local video stream/webcam and detect objects (Person, Cell Phone, etc) in real-time.

title: OSI Cortex: Private LLM Service
prompt: Prototype the 'Private LLM' offering by creating a web UI (Streamlit or standard OpenWebUI) for the local Ollama instance to serve as a 'Private ChatGPT'.

title: OSI Sentinel: Network Monitor
prompt: Create `osi_sentinel.py` to listen on a network interface (Scapy/PyShark) and log unique MAC addresses and high-bandwidth connections (Passive Monitoring).

title: Integration: Unified CLI
prompt: Create a master `osi_cli.py` that allows selecting between Scout, Vision, Cortex, and Sentinel modes from a single command.
